Package divisioner

Interface VariationPointDivisionConfiguration

All Known Implementing Classes:
RecallStrategy
public interface VariationPointDivisionConfiguration
Configuration of divisions into variation points in processed SPL
Author:
Jakub Perdek

    divisionAndGetHighlightedAst(String inputCodeFilePath)
    Loads and divisions the code in form of application AST into variation points (negative and/or positive variability) and returns the resulting highlighted/marked/annotated AST -includes transformation of the code into the application AST

  • Method Details

    • division

      void division(String inputCodeFilePath, String outputVisualizedAstPath, String fileOutputVariationPointsPath) throws NotFoundVariableDeclaration, IOException, InterruptedException, InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException, DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint, DuplicatedAnnotation
      Loads, divisions the code in form of application AST into variation points (negative and/or positive variability) and persists the resulting highlighted/marked/annotated AST and the list with variation points into appropriate files
      Parameters:
      inputCodeFilePath - - the path to the JavaScript/TypeScript script that is going to be loaded
      outputVisualizedAstPath - - the output path of visualized/marked/annotated/highlighted AST to visualize positions/locations of markers and annotations as the result of transformation from source AST
      fileOutputVariationPointsPath - - the output path for the list with information about variation points
      Throws:
      NotFoundVariableDeclaration
      IOException
      InterruptedException
      InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException
      DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint
      DuplicatedAnnotation

    • divisionAndGetVariationPointsData

      org.json.simple.JSONArray divisionAndGetVariationPointsData(String inputCodeFilePath) throws NotFoundVariableDeclaration, IOException, InterruptedException, InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException, DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint, DuplicatedAnnotation
      Divisions the content of base script/evolved file and extracts, collects, and returns information about variation points - variation points data
      Parameters:
      inputCodeFilePath - - the path to the JavaScript/TypeScript script that is going to be loaded
      Returns:
      information about variation points - variation points data (for both variability - positive and negative)
      Throws:
      NotFoundVariableDeclaration
      IOException
      InterruptedException
      InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException
      DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint
      DuplicatedAnnotation

    • divisionAndGetHighlightedAst

      org.json.simple.JSONObject divisionAndGetHighlightedAst(String inputCodeFilePath) throws NotFoundVariableDeclaration, IOException, InterruptedException, InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException, DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint, DuplicatedAnnotation
      Loads and divisions the code in form of application AST into variation points (negative and/or positive variability) and returns the resulting highlighted/marked/annotated AST -includes transformation of the code into the application AST
      Parameters:
      inputCodeFilePath - - the path to the JavaScript/TypeScript script that is going to be loaded
      Returns:
      the resulting highlighted/marked/annotated AST
      Throws:
      NotFoundVariableDeclaration
      IOException
      InterruptedException
      InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException
      DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint
      DuplicatedAnnotation

    • divisionAndGetHighlightedAst

      org.json.simple.JSONObject divisionAndGetHighlightedAst(org.json.simple.JSONObject loadedCodeAst, String inputCodeFilePath) throws NotFoundVariableDeclaration, IOException, InterruptedException, InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException, DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint, DuplicatedAnnotation
      Loads and divisions the application/script AST into variation points (negative and/or positive variability) and returns the resulting highlighted/marked/annotated AST
      Parameters:
      loadedCodeAst - - the root of the application/script AST
      inputCodeFilePath - - the path to the JavaScript/TypeScript script that is going to be loaded
      Returns:
      the resulting highlighted/marked/annotated AST
      Throws:
      NotFoundVariableDeclaration
      IOException
      InterruptedException
      InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException
      DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint
      DuplicatedAnnotation

    • getVariationPointsData

      org.json.simple.JSONArray getVariationPointsData(org.json.simple.JSONObject highlightedAst) throws NotFoundVariableDeclaration, IOException, InterruptedException, InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException, DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint, DuplicatedAnnotation
      Exports and collects information about variation points (variation points data) from highlighted.annotated/marked application AST
      Parameters:
      highlightedAst - - the AST of the original application with inserted markers and annotations - marked nagative and positive variability
      Returns:
      information about variation points - variation points data (for both variability - positive and negative)
      Throws:
      NotFoundVariableDeclaration
      IOException
      InterruptedException
      InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException
      DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint
      DuplicatedAnnotation

    • divisionAndGetHighlightedAst

      org.json.simple.JSONObject divisionAndGetHighlightedAst(String fileName, String inputCodeFilePath, Divisioner divisioner) throws NotFoundVariableDeclaration, IOException, InterruptedException, InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException, DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint, DuplicatedAnnotation
      Loads and divisions the code in form of application AST into variation points (negative and/or positive variability) and returns the resulting highlighted/marked/annotated AST -includes transformation of the code into the application AST
      Parameters:
      fileName - - the name of the file that is loaded/processed/updated
      inputCodeFilePath - - the path to the loaded JavaScript/TypeScript script
      divisioner - - object instance to manage and customize division process into variation points
      Returns:
      the resulting highlighted/marked/annotated AST
      Throws:
      NotFoundVariableDeclaration
      IOException
      InterruptedException
      InvalidSystemVariationPointMarkerException
      DifferentAnnotationTypesOnTheSameVariationPoint
      DuplicatedAnnotation
